description:
doc/install-source.html: update for go tool
Make some updates, get rid of mentions of make.
There remain a number of open questions.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM adg will need to help with the font stuff http://codereview.appspot.com/5720057/diff/1/doc/install-source.html File doc/install-source.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5720057/diff/1/doc/install-source.html#newcode12 doc/install-source.html:12: Most users don't need to do this, and will instead install I would put this new text and the next paragraph together into a new, single paragraph instead. http://codereview.appspot.com/5720057/diff/1/doc/install-source.html#newcode464 doc/install-source.html:464: install, and develop the Go tree. missing

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM

On Fri, Mar 2, 2012 at 2:33 PM,  <r@golang.org> wrote:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, gri@golang.org (cc:
> golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5720057/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d8bdfd02c7cd ***

doc/install-source.html: update for go tool
Make some updates, get rid of mentions of make.
There remain a number of open questions.
